Scene:
The Hokkokuya Inn at Fushimi,
(Fushimi Hokkokuya / 伏見北国屋)

Play: The Vendetta in Iga (伊賀越道中双六)

Production: April 1972

– Click image to view.

Takemoto Nanbudayū V (竹本南部大夫 (五))

Nozawa Matsunosuke (野澤松之輔)
